hint: Push state and date filters early into CTEs, convert comma joins to explicit JOINs, and pre-filter dimension tables to reduce fact table scans.
Isolate date and address filters into separate CTEs, then restructure the main query with explicit joins and pre-aggregated data to reduce correlation overhead.
Materialize all filtered fact and dimension tables into CTEs, compute aggregates once, and restructure the self-join pattern to avoid duplicate scans.
Transform the correlated subquery using a window function to compute state averages in a single scan, then flatten the query with explicit joins and early filtering.
